page.title: 05SHEPTON MALLET F.C.
page.content: THE PRESENT FOOTBALL CLUB WAS FORMED IN 1933.THEY USED TO PLAY IN THE SOMERSET LEAGUE WHICH THEY WON FOUR TIMES IN SEASONS 1948-9,1958-9,1974-5,1976-7 AND RUNNERS UP ONCE IN 1972-3.THEY NOW PLAY IN THE GREAT MILLS WESTERN LEAGUE AND NOW ARE IN DIVISON 1,AFTER BEING RELEAGATED THIS SEASON. THEY HAVE WON DIVISON 1 ONCE IN 1981-2 AND HAVE BEEN RUNNERS UP OF THE SAME DIVISION ONCE IN 1977-8.THEY PLAY AT WEST SHEPTON.THEY HAVE FLOODLIGHTS AND A SMALL STAND AND A CLUBHOUSE AND SOME CHANGING ROOMS.THEY WEAR BLACK AND WHITE.THE AVERAGE CROWD IS 50. THERE IS A SOCIAL CLUB IN COMMERCIAL ROAD. ON THE SAME SITE THERE IS THE CRICKET CLUB,THE RIFLE CLUB AND THE SCOUT HALL.
